import React,{ useState } from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar' const Contact = () => { const [FormData, setFormData] = useState({ fullname:'', email:'', password:'', msg:'', }) const getFormData = (event)=>{ const data = event.target.value; const name = event.target.name setFormData({[name]:data}) } return ( <>
